description: A beautiful modern house with a perfectly installed new roof.
Close-up of newly installed architectural asphalt shingles on a sunny day.
A sleek, modern metal roof on a house, showing durability and style.
A roofer in safety gear carefully repairing a section of a damaged roof.
A professional inspector with a clipboard thoroughly examining a roof's surface.
Clean, new white rain gutters installed perfectly along the edge of a house.
A house with a large blue tarp on the roof, indicating emergency repairs after a storm.
A diverse and professional construction team smiling together at a job site.
Four different samples of high-quality roofing materials, including shingles and tiles.
Close up of an asphalt shingle roof with clear circular damage marks from a hailstorm.
A perfectly installed new roof with high-quality architectural shingles.
A section of a roof where high winds have torn off several asphalt shingles, exposing the underlayment.
A roofer in safety gear carefully replacing a damaged shingle on a roof.
Close-up of old, sun-baked asphalt shingles that are curling up at the edges and cracking.
A beautiful new light-colored roof on a modern home, designed to be reflective and energy-efficient.
A large, brown water stain on a white ceiling, indicating a significant roof leak.
A roofer applying waterproof sealant around a vent pipe on a roof to fix a leak.
Roofers tearing off old shingles from a residential roof to prepare for a new installation.
A close-up of a wooden roof deck being inspected for water damage or rot before new underlayment is installed.
A roofer rolling out new black synthetic underlayment on a clean roof deck, providing a water-resistant barrier.
A roofer uses a nail gun to install new architectural asphalt shingles on a roof.
Detailed view of a roofer installing new metal step flashing along a chimney to prevent leaks.
A clean residential yard and driveway after a roof replacement, with a pristine new roof in the background.
A roofer on a ladder inspecting a roof for repair needs.
Close-up of a roofer pointing out cracked and missing shingles on a roof.
A roofer carefully nailing down a new shingle to repair a damaged section of a roof.
A roofer looking over a completed roof repair job, ensuring everything is sealed.
A large blue tarp securely fastened over a storm-damaged section of a roof to prevent further water intrusion.
A roofer taking photos of hail damage on a roof with a smartphone for an insurance claim.
A roofer discussing an insurance claim with a homeowner, reviewing documents.
A full roofing crew working together to replace a roof damaged by a severe storm.
A roof inspector walking around the exterior of a home, looking at siding and lower roof sections.
A roof inspector carefully walking on a roof, checking for soft spots, damaged shingles, and worn flashing.
An inspector using a flashlight inside a dark attic to check the underside of the roof deck for signs of leaks or mold.
A person reviewing a detailed roofing inspection report on a tablet, showing photos and recommendations.
A professional using gloves to scoop out wet leaves and debris from a clogged residential gutter.
A worker applying waterproof sealant to a leaking corner joint of a metal gutter.
A new section of seamless aluminum gutter being installed on the fascia board of a house.
A close-up of a high-quality mesh gutter guard installed over a gutter to keep leaves out.
A worker installing a standing seam metal roof panel on a residential home.
Close-up of a worker installing the final metal trim and flashing on a metal roof.
A turbine roof vent installed on a shingle roof, helping to ventilate the attic.
